Dialogue.Page: This crystal and others like it created a local gravity distortions used to traverse steep surfaces, when the planets still existed.
A Nomai that survived aboard the Deep Storm Station constructed a superweapon composed of many of these crystals, inspired by the comet that had annihilated their clan.
Powered by both curiosity and grief, they hoped to recreate the comet, and avenge their lost clan by delivering an even more destructive weapon towards the source of the Interloper.
However, upon realizing the imminent danger of complete extinction that the Hearthians' ancestors faced, they were spurred to use their creation to protect them instead.

Using the weapon's gravitational field, they collected as much ghost matter as they could with the weapon, before warping its payload into the Deep Storm Station - sacrificing themself to contain the matter safely.
Thanks to their efforts, the Hearthians survived to explore a world largely safe of ghost matter shortly before the universe ended.
We were never able to learn how our ancestors survived the arrival of the Interloper.
